CustomField.description: This process creates a new Contact record directly from an existing Lead, without requiring Account or Opportunity creation. It maps key Lead information (such as Name, Email, Phone, and Address) into the Contact record. The purpose is to simplify lead management when Accounts or Opportunities are not needed, ensuring sales/support teams can quickly work with Contacts generated from inbound leads.
